sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT /*+ append parallel(zh,8) */ zh.jgdh,max(jg.jgmc) AS jgmc,$qsrq$ AS qsrq,$jsrq$ AS jsrq,$zhye$ AS zhye, SUM( CASE WHEN zh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh LIKE 'XN%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS mfp, SUM( CASE WHEN zh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh LIKE 'XN%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS yfp FROM jxdx_ckzh zh left join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=zh.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON jg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join xtb_jggxst st on st.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh and st.sjjgkhdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and $jsrq$ between st.qsrq and st.jsrq WHERE zh.khrq BETWEEN $qsrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND zh.zhye>$zhye$ GROUP BY zh.jgdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT /*+ append parallel(zh,8) */ zh.jgdh,max(jg.jgmc) AS jgmc,$qsrq$ AS qsrq,$jsrq$ AS jsrq,$zhye$ AS zhye, SUM( CASE WHEN zh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh LIKE 'XN%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS mfp, SUM( CASE WHEN zh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh LIKE 'XN%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS yfp FROM jxdx_ckzh zh left join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=zh.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON jg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join xtb_jggxst st on st.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh and st.sjjgkhdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and $jsrq$ between st.qsrq and st.jsrq WHERE zh.khrq BETWEEN $qsrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND zh.zhye>$zhye$ GROUP BY zh.jgdh ) t
